name: Super Lumi Live
description:
Super Lumi Live is a deceptively simple yet challenging neon platformer with refined controls, a wealth of hidden depth and diverse challenges.

Navigate through 60 unique levels to reach The Core and escape The Producer's insanity!


  • Easy to play, difficult to master.
  • Fast, fluid movement with precise controls.
  • 60 traditional sized levels across 6 worlds.
  • Gravity twisting Warp Space levels.
  • Time targets, challenging collectibles and sneaky secrets.
  • Replays and Ghosts.
  • Level/world editors*.
  • ALL future updates and content are free**.
* Not available at launch.
** At least two new worlds planned.
